A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. Just terrible. Ruins all the setups from its prequel\, and takes a big\, reeking dump all over the legacy of the original trilogy- and most notably\, Luke Skywalker. Although not entirely Rian Johnson's fault due to the ludicrously vague plan set by Disney\, I believe he should have rejected the offer of directing the film\, and let JJ Abrams continue on his admittedly decent The Force Awakens.
